name: financialdatapy
description: financialdatapy is a python package for getting a fundamental financial data of a company. User can see the company's latest financial statement reported, standard financials, and historical stock price. financialdatapy will be a good choice for research purposes, and managing an investment portfolio. financialdatapy is made for retail investors who uses stock data in their portfolio management or a research purposes.
whatidid: Scraped, and preprocessed financial statement, and historical stock price data of companies in USA, and KOR specifically. Deployed the package to PyPI with full documentation made with Sphinx.

name: pyqt stock chart
description: pyqt stock chart is a simple Mac OS application that displays stock price chart in a watchlist. The application can add and remove stocks in the watchlist. Price chart of stocks in the watchlist will be loaded. The project is primarily made for my personal use to easily track the price of stocks I have invested.
whatidid: Used PyQt5 in building GUI application and deployed an executable application with PyInstaller.

name: naverplacescraper
description: naverplacescraper is a python package that scrapes store reviews of a store from Naver Place. User can search by store name, or multiple stores at once. naverplacescraper is made for research or data mining purposes only.
whatidid: Made a bot to scrape store description and store reviews that is searched. Deployed the package to PypI. Originally, it was made to use it on my capstone project.

name: musinsa-ranking
description: Using Github Action, I was able to build a workflow that sends current search keyword ranking in Musinsa store to my email every morning.
whatidid: Created Github Action workflow as proof of concept for running a cron job.

name: fontend - React
description: Created React application where user can get information on places where they can involve in Sustainable Tourism. User can look for restaurants, café, places to stay, and plogging courses. For restaurants, and café, user can choose filter keywords to find stores. Then, locations will be displayed in a map.
whatidid: Using React, we implemented 4 main services which provides user information on restaurant, café, places to stay, and plogging course. For plogging courses, we fetch walking/jogging courses from Durunubi service API. And with Kakao web API, location of stores and plogging courses are displayed on Kakako map.

name: backend - Django
description: Created Django application for client to communicate with the server. Built REST API for the client to query data from a database.
whatidid: Scraped list of stores where Jeju local cash voucher can be used and store reviews from Naver Place. Extracted keywords from reviews, and stored store list and extracted keywords in PostgreSQL database. And built REST API with Django Rest Framework(DRF) that will handle query parameters sent from client to return the result of keyword filterings.
